The '''13th Dallas-Fort Worth Film Critics Association Awards''', given by the [[Dallas-Fort Worth Film Critics Association]] on 19 December 2006, honored the best in film for [[2006 in film|2006]].<ref name="mcn"/>
==Top 10 films== # ''[[United 93 (film)|United 93]]'' # ''[[The Departed]]'' (Academy Award for Best Picture) # ''[[Little Miss Sunshine]]'' # ''[[The Queen (film)|The Queen]]'' # ''[[Babel (film)|Babel]]'' # ''[[Letters from Iwo Jima]]'' # ''[[Dreamgirls (film)|Dreamgirls]]'' # ''[[Blood Diamond (film)|Blood Diamond]]'' # ''[[Little Children (film)|Little Children]]'' # ''[[Flags of Our Fathers (film)|Flags of Our Fathers]]''
==Winners== *Best Actor: **[[Forest Whitaker]] – ''[[The Last King of Scotland (film)|The Last King of Scotland]] ''
*Best Actress: **[[Helen Mirren]] – ''[[The Queen (film)|The Queen]]''
*Best Animated Film: **''[[Happy Feet]]''
*Best Cinematography: **''[[Apocalypto]]'' – [[Dean Semler]]
*Best Director: **[[Martin Scorsese]] – ''[[The Departed]]''
*Best Documentary Film: **''[[An Inconvenient Truth]]''
*Best Film: **'''''[[United 93 (film)|United 93]]'''''
*Best Foreign Language Film: **''[[Letters from Iwo Jima]]'', [[USA]]/[[Japan]]
*Best Supporting Actor: **[[Jackie Earle Haley]] – ''[[Little Children (film)|Little Children]]''
*Best Supporting Actress: **[[Cate Blanchett]] – ''[[Notes on a Scandal (film)|Notes on a Scandal]]''
